title: Soloq isn't toxic to OCE.
body:
Octavias joined the room.
Lady Lucky Smile joined the room.
{{champion:9}} IronArtificer joined the room.
Greenbeenz joined the room.
Octavias: fill
Lady Lucky Smile: anything but sup
Lady Lucky Smile: not plat for you fiddle
Lady Lucky Smile: i will afk
Octavias: Oh we have fid again
Octavias: :P
Octavias: Go a more... common mid if you're gonna mid
Octavias: And please ban Raksai
Lady Lucky Smile: i will just afk and feed
Octavias: And kat
Lady Lucky Smile: no plat for you
Lady Lucky Smile: feed and afk sorry
Octavias: Lady why the **** q?
Lady Lucky Smile: feed then afk actuall
Octavias: Just dodge then
Greenbeenz: what is up with this guyt
Lady Lucky Smile: nah
Lady Lucky Smile: i will feed then afk
Octavias: He's just being salty :/
Lady Lucky Smile: lol
Lady Lucky Smile: im
Octavias: Why even ******* bother to even go into game?
Lady Lucky Smile: thats why i revenge?
Lady Lucky Smile: lol
Lady Lucky Smile: i dont care
Octavias: Build a bridge kid and get over it
Lady Lucky Smile: i have points to lose
Octavias: And?
Lady Lucky Smile: yep
Lady Lucky Smile: i will remember his id and akf everytime i meet him
Octavias: You know i will screen shot all this save and put in a ticket right?
Octavias: You're such a child.
Lady Lucky Smile: im
Lady Lucky Smile: i dont think he cares
Lady Lucky Smile: 9 LP only
Bad Place Touch: top
Lady Lucky Smile: thats what he said
Octavias: Well goodluck with the ban.
Octavias: Mid please.
Lady Lucky Smile: i fill
Octavias: Can you adc?
(Fid is iron)


Yay for tribunal doing a good job.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Best Viktor AU,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=40g27sY9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-29T08:15:14.671+0000)
>
> There is no tribunal.

That's the point

1. No tribunal (on any server)
2. Off meta midlaners are fine
3. No name and shame on the forums.

Do what you said you would and send a ticket instead of posting on the forums.
I read the title and I thought to myself, "Soloq isn't toxic to OCE because OCE is toxic to Soloq"

telling someone to pick a "common" mid... shame on you, you toxic fuk

8)
That is the issue here I agree.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=40g27sY9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-29T08:15:11.047+0000)
>
> telling someone to pick a "common" mid... shame on you, you toxic fuk
> 
> 8)

His Fid really didn't help.. Lol
was she cute? is she hot?
